resources.string: password should be atleast 6 characters long

Social Dukan is one shop for all marketing activities. We are a 2-year-old startup based in Delhi. Our premium services include hosting and managing internship for top companies, raising sponsorship for events, live concerts, managing influencers. We also cater some other services like Graphic Designing, Website Development, Video Designing, etc.\n\nWe have done collaborations with various institutes and companies, such as, IIT Delhi, IIT Kharagpur, Jadavpur University, Delhi University, Devfest by Google community and a lot more.
